body: Hi Guy, I'm new to LB. I looked up solar envelope tutorial and it seems really good for designers at concept stage. i download the sample set of component and the Sun path component i wasnt able to get it to work. i think they are other problems too. if anyone can kindly help. in attachment: solar envelop, Solar analysis with Sun path[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LUsy7Fn8dUSk*t*b9jkFzRuDSD-3t0s2ZcgE2GbxLTrljluqlQafW9doGCrTEGcKyUAolH1HR3X91eM-Sx68VummqdMoyVXv/01.JPG)
